short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a right-click menu to search for any selected text within Atlassian Jira.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to search for issues in Jira directly, without manually opening the Jira website and entering query conditions. Users simply need to select a piece of text on any webpage, then choose the search option from the right-click menu to view the search results in a new Jira tab.
